doc.author: 黄维
doc.description: 对工单配置字段的查询

sqlquery.name: BaseOwnFieldInfo.BaseOn_BaseSchemaSelectBase
sqlquery.select: select C1 as BaseOwnFieldInfoID, C650000001 as BaseCategoryName, C650000002 as BaseCategorySchama, C650000011 as BaseFix_field_EditPhase, C650000010 as BaseFix_field_RequiredPhase, C650000009 as BaseFree_field_EditStep, C650000008 as BaseFree_field_ShowStep, C650000100 as BaseOwnFieldInfoDesc, C650000004 as Base_field_DBName, C650000003 as Base_field_ID, C650000019 as Base_field_IsRequired, C650000018 as Base_field_Purpose_FlowControl, C650000017 as Base_field_Purpose_Print, C650000005 as Base_field_ShowName, C650000006 as Base_field_Type, C650000007 as Base_field_TypeValue, C650000014 as EntryMode, C650000016 as LogIsWrite, C650000012 as PrintOneLine, C650000013 as PrintOrder, C650000021 as Base_field_Is_AllPrint, C650000020 as Base_field_WriteAction, C650000015 as VarcharFieldeIsExceed, C650000023 as Base_field_DefaultValue from {WF:Config_BaseOwnFieldInfo_Mobile} BaseOwnFieldInfo where $BaseOn_BaseSchemaSelectBase$ $selectcondition$ $orderby$
